title: Scenes from the Holidays
description: Scenes from the Holidays consists of short Tarot Sequence vignettes, released serially beginning in December 12, 2020, on K.D. Edwardsâ€™ Twitter account. The scenes take place between the end of THE HANGED MAN and the start of the forthcoming third book, THE HOURGLASS THRONE. The scenes center around Sun Estate activities during an Equinox celebration.The compiled version is available for free on the author's website in PDF, MOBI, and ePUB versions.
author: K.D. Edwards
